attributes.action: BRING OUR TROOPS HOME FROM IRAQ  SONEAR RATHER THAT LATER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE IS NUTHING TO SAY BUT I AM A 13YR OLD SCHOOOLBOY AND I WANT THE PRIME MINSTER TO BRING THE TROOPS HOME SONEAR RATHER THAN LATER

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
